id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select r.id as registId,r.danger_time as dangerTime,i.id as InsuranceId,i.insurance_category as insuranceCategory, i.license_plate_no as licensePlateNo,i.insured_name as insuredName,r.claim_notification_no as claimNotificationNo,r.company_code as companyCode from ce_regist r left join ce_insurance i on r.id=i.regist_id where (r.claim_notification_no,r.company_code) in
(#{item.claimNotificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select r.id as registId,r.danger_time as dangerTime,i.id as InsuranceId,i.insurance_category as insuranceCategory, i.license_plate_no as licensePlateNo,i.insured_name as insuredName from ce_regist r left join ce_insurance i on r.id=i.regist_id where i.regist_id in
#{item,jdbcType=BIGINT}
